Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2013 05:20PM barbhenz wrote: I had a bilateral mastectomy last Thursday with expanders and had sentinal lymph node removal.  This is my second go around as I had a lumpectomy with radiation in 2005.  I'm not sure what my expectations were but when am I going to feel better.  Last night I vomitted just one time, but today I feel like I have someone stepping on my chest just below the bra line.  I thought I would be feeling a bit better by now.  Sorry to be so whiney.  I have a cough so I'm wondering if that has caused the chest soreness.  I saw the plastic surgeon today and he said I seem to be heeling well and I see the breast surgeon tomorrow and hopefully find out the finalized pathology report.  That will determine if I need chemo or not.  I have managed to be positive and a trooper so far, but today is a bad day.  Any words of wisdom of when I will physically start to feel better?
Posts.Title: April 2013 Mastectomy ldesim ashleigh
